summary: I HAVE A DODGE DURANGO 2005 WITH A HEMI 5.7L ENGINE.  I AM HAVING A PROBLEM WITH IT STALLING WHEN I MAKE A SLOW TURN.  IT HAS ONLY 2450 MILES ON IT AND IT HAS STALLED SEVERAL TIMES.  WHEN IT STALLS, I LOOSE POWER STEERING AND IT HAS ALMOST CAUSED ME TO BE IN AN ACCIDENT.  THIS HAS HAPPENED ABOUT A DOZEN TIMES. *JB
